attributes.action: ensure that all nurses who undertake bank nursing duties are paid at a rate acceptable to them and which fully reflects the skills and specialist training they have undertaken.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nurses are being asked to accept a pay cut in Hillingdon and elsewhere for work undertaken on their days off. This 'bank work' requires nurses, aready undervalued, to work during their rest days for rates of pay which do not reflect the work they undertake nor skills they have. Nurses should be paid for the skills they have not simply the dedication they give.
